mapper.select: SELECT srp.ROLE_PERMISSION_ID, srp.ROLE_ID, srp.PERMISSION_ID, ADD_RIGHTS, DELETE_RIGHTS, EDIT_RIGHTS, VIEW_RIGHTS, IMPORT_RIGHTS, EXPORT_RIGHTS, srp.CREATE_TIME, srp.CREATOR, srp.MODIFY_TIME, srp.MODIFIER FROM sys_role_permission srp LEFT JOIN sys_permission_menu spm ON srp.permission_id = spm.permission_id WHERE spm.menu_id = #{menuId} AND srp.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_id AS menuId, r.role_name AS roleName, p.permission_name AS permissionName, m.menu_name AS menuName, rp.role_id AS roleId, rp.permission_id AS permissionId, rp.add_rights AS addRights, rp.delete_rights AS deleteRights, rp.edit_rights AS editRights, rp.view_rights AS viewRights, rp.import_rights AS importRights, rp.export_rights AS exportRights FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON rp.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission_menu pm ON pm.permission_id = p.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON pm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
